collegeDepartmentDescription:
Head of Department: Michael Rothberg
Department Office, 208 English Building, 608 South Wright, Urbana, 333-2391
Subjects associated with this department include:  Business and Technical Writing (BTW),  Creative Writing (CW), English (ENGL), and Rhetoric and Composition (RHET).
www.english.uiuc.edu
